ipcameraInfo.describes: Information about the deployed IP camera. Lot of the information about features is available in camera data sheet that can be pulled out using mfdId

modelpartNum.describes: Model Number and Manufacturer of the IP camera.

hasAudioCapability.describes: Describes if the ip-camera has audio capability. [False by Default]

hasONVIFCapability.describes: Describes if the ip-camera is ONVIF capable. [True by Default]

hasWirelessCapability.describes: Describes if the ip-camera is wireless capable

dataSheetURL.describes: Link for the URL for getting the data sheet for the camera

subscriptionProtocols.describes: The streaming protocols supported for the live stream for this IP camera. (NOTE: Video server makes the camera stream available in this format. This may be different from the camera streams provided by the IP Camera)

storageFileFormats.describes: Various file formats in which archives for this camera stream are available
